Diablo.name: Shadow Charge
Diablo.description: Charge an enemy, knocking them back, dealing 75 (+4% per level) damage and gaining 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%. If the enemy collides with terrain, they are stunned for 1 second and take an additional 150 (+4% per level) damage.

Diablo.name: Fire Stomp
Diablo.description: Unleashes fire waves in all directions that deal 54 (+4% per level) damage each. Once they reach maximum range, they return dealing an additional 81 (+4% per level) damage.

Diablo.name: Overpower
Diablo.description: Grabs the target and slams it behind Diablo, dealing 73 (+4% per level) damage and stunning for 0.25 seconds.

Diablo.name: Apocalypse
Diablo.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

Diablo.name: Lightning Breath
Diablo.description: Become Unstoppable while channeling lightning that deals 800 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds.  The direction of the Lightning changes with your mouse cursor position.

Diablo.name: Black Soulstone
Diablo.description: Gain 10 Souls per Hero killed and 1 Soul per Minion, up to 100. For each Soul, gain 0.4% maximum Health. If Diablo has 100 Souls upon dying, he will resurrect in 5 seconds but lose 100 Souls.

1.name: Bulwark
1.description: Increases the duration of Armor granted by Shadow Charge from 2 seconds to 4 seconds.

1.name: Devil's Due
1.description: Black Soulstone increases the effects of Regen Globes and Healing Fountains by 2% per Soul.

1.name: Life Leech
1.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal Diablo for the same amount.

4.name: From the Shadows
4.description: Increases the cast range of Shadow Charge by 40%.

4.name: Speed Demon
4.description: Being Stunned or Rooted increases Diablo's Movement Speed by 30% for 5 seconds.

4.name: Demonic Strength
4.description: Once Overpower's stun expires, the target is slowed by 30% for 3 seconds.

7.name: Soul Feast
7.description: Black Soulstone increases Diablo's Health Regeneration by 0.4 per second per Soul.

7.name: Soul Shield
7.description: Black Soulstone grants Diablo 0.25 Spell Armor per soul, reducing Ability Damage taken by 0.25% per Soul.

7.name: Diabolical Momentum
7.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Overpower and Shadow Charge by 1.5 seconds.

10.name: Apocalypse
10.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

10.name: Lightning Breath
10.description: Become Unstoppable while channeling lightning that deals 800 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds.  The direction of the Lightning changes with your mouse cursor position.

13.name: Devastating Charge
13.description: Shadow Charge's terrain collision against Heroes deals an additional 5% of the target's maximum life. Quest: Each time an enemy Hero takes terrain collision damage, increase the maximum life damage by 2%, to a maximum of 10% bonus.

13.name: Fire Devil
13.description: Fire Stomp increases Diablo's Basic Attack damage by 20% and surrounds Diablo in flames that deal 20 (+4% per level) damage every second. Lasts 6 seconds.

13.name: Hellfire
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Fire Stomp increases the damage of the next Fire Stomp by 12%, up to 120%.

16.name: Debilitating Flames
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Fire Stomp are slowed by 15% for 2 seconds, up to 30%.

16.name: Domination
16.description: Casting Overpower resets the cooldown of Shadow Charge.

16.name: Fearful Presence
16.description: Activate to reduce the damage dealt by nearby enemy Heroes by 30% for 3 seconds. Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack Diablo have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

20.name: Dying Breath
20.description: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds and is cast for free when Diablo dies.

20.name: Hellstorm
20.description: Lightning Breath lasts and reaches 50% longer.

20.name: Lord of Terror
20.description: Activate to steal 10% of the maximum Health of nearby enemy Heroes.

20.name: Hellgate
20.description: Teleport and place a demonic rune at target location. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies for 1.75 seconds.
